item.title: Gaia Labs Raises $20.00M in Funding, Led by ByteTrade and MiranaDecentralized AI agent infrastructure Gaia Labs has announced that it has raised a total of $20.00M in seed and Series A funding. The round was led by ByteTrade/SIG Capital (Susquehanna) and Mirana/Mantle Eco Fund, with participation from EVM Capital, Taisu Ventures, NGC Ventures, Selini Capital, Presto, Stake Capital, FactBlock, G20, Amber, Cogitent Ventures, Paper Ventures, Republic Crypto, Outlier Ventures, MoonPay, BitGo, SpiderCrypto, Consensys, and others. The funds will be used for mobile AI, infrastructure expansion, open AI toolkits, and Web3 migration applications. [Foresight News]

item.title: H100 Group increased its holdings by 117.93 bitcoins, bringing its total holdings to 628.22 bitcoinsOn July 23, H100 Group announced that the company purchased 117.93 bitcoins according to its bitcoin vault strategy, with an average purchase price of about 1,120,000.00 Swedish kronor per bitcoin, with a total investment of about 132,000,000.00 kronor. Part of the purchase came from convertible bond financing. As of now, the company's total bitcoin holdings are 628.22. [PANews]

item.title: Hyperion announces the official launch of RION Utility, initiating the first phase of the native staking mechanism, RION Staking.Aptos' largest decentralized trading platform, Hyperion, has announced the official launch of the RION Utility prologue, taking the lead in opening the native staking Staking Phase Ⅰ. Users can now lock up $RION to participate in the native staking mechanism, entering the first stage of network construction and value sharing. The total duration of the Staking Phase Ⅰ event is 1 month, and the user's staking time is based on the actual participation time. The rewards come from part of the platform's transaction fee revenue. This mechanism is intended to identify and incentivize real contributors, and lay the foundation for more RION application scenarios in the future, while reflecting Hyperion's high emphasis on real interaction and positive ecological cycles. Hyperion stated that this stage is the first step in unlocking RION Utility, and more utility scenarios based on real revenue will continue to be released in the future. [Odaily News]

Another 30 million $S will be distributed through Sonic Gems in succession, with no minimum threshold for receiving them, so stay tuned. [PANews]

item.title: Trump says interest rate cuts could save trillions in interest, but a "Federal Reserve mouthpiece" says it's impossible."Fed mouthpiece" Nick Timiraos said that Trump stated that if the Fed lowered short-term interest rates, the U.S.'s interest expenses would decrease by $1 trillion per year. The U.S. spent $1.1 trillion on interest expenses in 2024, so this claim is almost certainly untrue. (Golden Ten) [Odaily]

item.title: Vaulta (formerly EOS) receives a $6.00M investment commitment from WLFI to advance Web3 banking in the USAccording to official sources, WLFI has reached a strategic partnership with Vaulta (formerly EOS). WLFI has committed to investing $6.00M to promote the development of Web3 banking in the United States. Vaulta's native assets will be incorporated into WLFI's macro-strategic reserves, and WLFI's USD1 stablecoin will be directly integrated into Vaulta's Web3 banking infrastructure. [Odaily]

item.title: Lazpad, the AI agent launch platform on the LazAI ecosystem chain, has launched the AI companion DAT and opened a whitelist event.On July 23, Web3 native AI infrastructure protocol LazAI will launch AI companion Data Anchored Tokens (DATs) for the first time on its testnet. Users can connect with an evolving AI entity with memory and earn rewards through interaction. This event is launched on Lazpad, an AI agent launch platform on the LazAI ecosystem chain. Users can complete a series of tasks to qualify for the whitelist. Each whitelisted address will receive a free DAT blind box and additional rewards, as well as C.ALITH airdrop qualification. At the same time, LazAI is launching a referral invitation campaign. Invite friends to earn activity points, and the top ten inviters will receive additional rare DAT rewards according to their ranking. It is reported that Lazpad is an easy-to-use on-chain AI agent launch platform that supports both open and selected assetization paths. It is supported by LazAI's internal incentive ecosystem and deeply integrated into the ecosystem, and is committed to transforming complex AI models into interoperable, composable, and tradable agent tokens. These AI agents, carried by tokens, open up a path of co-creation crowdfunding, public participation, and a win-win situation for creators, investors, and the agents themselves. [Odaily News]

item.title: James Wynn Liquidated Again, Hyperliquid Account Falls Below $300,000.00According to Lookonchain monitoring, James Wynn's BTC and PEPE long positions have once again been liquidated. Despite previously depositing an additional $1.25M into Hyperliquid, his current account balance has fallen below $300,000. [Odaily星球日报]

item.title: Antalpha Founder Appointed Chairman of Cango's Board, Completing Full Transition to Bitcoin Mining BusinessCango has announced the completion of its full transition from an automotive transaction platform to a Bitcoin mining company, and has restructured its board of directors and management team. Antalpha founder and CEO Jin Xin has been appointed Chairman of the Board, further solidifying the connection with Bitmain. Antalpha is a financial services platform backed by Bitmain. The new CEO, Yu Peng, was previously the Chief Strategy Officer of Antalpha and has an asset management background. Several new members with Antalpha backgrounds have also been added to the board of directors. Cango currently holds over 4,000 Bitcoins. [Wu Blockchain]

item.title: LGHL increases its stake in SUI, bringing total treasury reserves to $9.60 millionOn July 23, Lion Group Holdings Limited (LGHL, NASDAQ: LGHL) announced that it has increased its holdings of SUI tokens, bringing the total purchase amount of its HYPE, SOL and SUI tokens to approximately US$9.6 million. As of July 23, 2025, LGHL's treasury reserves include 128,929 Hyperliquid (HYPE), 6,629 Solana (SOL) and 1,015,680 Sui (SUI) tokens. The company said it will continue to explore strategic opportunities in the digital asset field and regularly announce the latest progress of its treasury reserves. [PANews]

item.title: Dow rallies as markets cheer US-Japan trade agreementStocks rallied in early-morning trading on Wednesday, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average adding more than 200 points at the open. Investors appeared to welcome President Donald Trump’s announcement that the U.S. had reached a trade deal with Japan. The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose nearly 240 points, and the S&P 500 inched higher by 0.4% to extend gains at its record highs. Optimism of potentially more trade agreements ahead of Trump’s Aug. 1 tariffs deadline also saw the Nasdaq Composite edge up, adding a modest 0.16% in early trading. With corporate earnings, spotlighted by Tesla (TSLA) and Alphabet (GOOGL, GOOG), set to hit the market after the bell, early cheers had futures across the major U.S. indices flashing rising green. Upbeat sentiment on Wall Street carried through the Asia and European sessions, investors are envisioning the U.S.-Japan deal as a huge one. In addition to the 15% tariff on Japanese imports, Trump’s administration managed to secure a $550 billion Japanese investment in the U.S. “There has never been anything like it,” Trump said of the deal in a Truth Social post . “Perhaps most importantly, Japan will open their Country to Trade including Cars and Trucks, Rice and certain other Agricultural Products, and other things. Japan will pay Reciprocal Tariffs to the United States of 15%. This is a very exciting time for the United States of America, and especially for the fact that we will continue to always have a great relationship with the Country of Japan.” The news came as markets weighed the potential impact of fresh trade tensions as the looming Aug. 1 deadline first approaches. However, with U.S. officials noting a likely extension of the Aug. 12 deadline for China, this latest move injects a sense of bullishness for investors. Stocks have shown resilience over the past few months amid tariff uncertainty. Investors also weathered a geopolitical storm in the Middle East. However, none of the headwinds that followed Trump’s so-called “Liberation Day” tariffs have entirely derailed bulls, with U.S. stocks marching to record highs. Corporate earnings have so far provided buyers with upside fuel, even as more clarity on the tariffs’ impact will become clearer with the release of Google-parent Alphabet’s and electric vehicle giant Tesla’s quarterly earnings reports. Mohamed El-Erian, president of Queen’s College at Cambridge University and chief economic advisor at Allianz, has nonetheless cautioned investors to beware of what’s happening in the bond market. “While media attention is rightly focused on the Japan-U.S. trade deal, don’t overlook what is happening to the long end of the Japanese bond market where, driven mainly by fiscal concerns, yields continue to climb,” El-Erian noted via X . “With what is a correlated, rather than coordinated, fiscal expansion in the three largest advanced economies — the US, Germany, and Japan — global bond markets have a lot of issuance to digest in the period ahead.”

item.title:
Wu Blockchain Daily Crypto News Highlights - Data: The Ethereum validator exit queue is currently around 519,000 ETH, a new high since January 2024.1. Data: Ethereum validator exit queue size is currently about 519,000 ETH, a new high since January 2024
With Ethereum's year-to-date increase of over 160%, the ETH validator exit queue has surged. Data from the validatorqueue website shows that as of July 23, the number of ETH waiting to exit in the queue has reached 519,000, with a total value of approximately $1.92 billion at the current price, and the waiting time for exit exceeds 9 days, a new high since January 2024. Analysts believe that this round of exits is mainly due to some early stakers choosing to take profits after the price increase. At the same time, due to the continuous entry of ETH treasury-like companies including SharpLink Gaming and Bitmine, the market still shows strong staking demand, and currently 357,000 ETH are waiting to enter the network, with a queuing time of more than 6 days.
2. Arthur Hayes: Year-end target is $250,000 for Bitcoin and $10,000 for Ethereum
Arthur Hayes predicted in his latest blog post that the year-end target is $250,000 for Bitcoin and $10,000 for Ethereum. He said that the upcoming Ethereum bull market will completely detonate the market, and Maelstrom (his personal family office) is doing everything related to Ethereum, DeFi, and ERC-20 shitcoins.
3. South Korean Financial Supervisory Service: Restricting the proportion of corporate ETF investments related to crypto assets
The South Korean financial regulator, the Financial Supervisory Service, recently provided oral guidance to local asset management companies, requiring them to control the proportion of investments in crypto asset-related companies such as CoinBase and MicroStrategy in their ETF portfolios, and reiterated that the 2017 "Emergency Measures for Virtual Currencies" is still valid, prohibiting financial institutions from holding, purchasing, or investing in shares of virtual asset-related companies. This move is seen as a response to the recent rapid increase in the weight of "crypto-themed" companies in South Korean ETFs, with the proportion of related constituent stocks in several ETFs currently exceeding 10%.
4. Goldman Sachs and BNY Mellon partner to launch tokenized money market fund investment service
Goldman Sachs and BNY Mellon have jointly launched a new service for institutional investors that allows them to invest in tokenized money market funds through Goldman Sachs' blockchain platform. The project has been joined by several asset management institutions, including BlackRock and Fidelity. The two banks stated that the project will lay the foundation for money market funds in a "24/7 real-time trading" digital financial system and is expected to be expanded in the future for use as collateral in financial transactions.

item.title: Institutions: Tariff uncertainty may prompt the ECB to cut interest rates more than onceAccording to a report by Algebris Investments analyst Gabriele Foa, the European Central Bank's interest rate cuts may exceed current market expectations due to tariff uncertainty. The portfolio manager stated, "Trade tensions and tariff developments may push the end of the easing cycle slightly lower than current market expectations." LSEG data shows that money markets currently expect the ECB to cut interest rates by another 25 basis points in December. Foa said that the spillover effects of tariffs on Europe may take longer to materialize. (Golden Ten) [Odaily]

item.title: BitMine Immersion (BMNR) Announces the Start of Options Trading on the NYSECrypto mining firm BitMine Immersion (NYSE: BMNR) has announced that options on the company's common stock will begin trading on the New York Stock Exchange on July 23, covering multiple standard expiration dates and strike prices. Officials say the move is expected to increase stock liquidity and provide investors with more risk management and strategic trading options. BitMine Chairman of the Board Thomas Lee said this reflects the market's confidence in its strategy to "acquire 5.00% of global ETH". [Wu Blockchain]

item.title: Plasma Launches New Phase of Stablecoin Collective: Workshop Kicks OffOn July 23, according to the Plasma announcement, the Plasma stablecoin collective has officially entered a new stage, launching new initiatives such as monthly seminars. As the mainnet beta is approaching, Plasma has added new roles such as builders and early contributors, and encouraged members to participate in teams to demonstrate the importance of stablecoins in promoting global capital flows. Teams must submit before July 25, and the first seminar will be held on July 28. Plasma said that education is the core of promoting the popularization of stablecoins, and collaborative discussions are an efficient way to make collective progress. Outstanding projects will also have the opportunity to receive support. [PANews]
